data.name: Masters of Puzzle - Desolation by Thomas Cole
data.detailed_description:
We present to you Desolation: the fifth of five paintings in the series The Course of Empire by the classical artist Thomas Cole*. The UHD illustration captures the exquisite details of the original painting and will provide a good challenge even for veteran puzzle builders. We hope you'll enjoy this beautiful puzzle box as much as we do.

Content Details

Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle. You will be able to access this content from within the base game. It will only be downloaded on demand by using the corresponding in-game menus in order to preserve storage space and bandwidth.


* Note: The painting used in this DLC is in the public domain in its country of origin and other countries and areas where the copyright term is the author's life plus 100 years or less.

data.short_description: A classical painting puzzle box for the Masters of Puzzle game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 110 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min requirements might be subject of a change
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 110 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements might be subject of a change
